original_title: Burhani Serendib School to host ’’Reshaping the Future with Artificial Intelligence’’
original_body_lines: At a time when the world is adapting to Artificial Intelligence (AI), the Burhani Serendib School has organized an informative event, "Reshaping the Future with Artificial Intelligence" which will be held on May 20 from 3.30 p.m.
The event will feature Dr. Tara De Mel and Mr Khuzaima Hussain who will discuss the way forward using AI.
Participants from 4 continents and 14 countries have already registered.
"It promises to be a remarkable gathering, where you can explore the transformative power of artificial intelligence alongside industry experts and enthusiasts," the school said in a statement.
